title: Actions
content: ice of the Circle Action Grant an ally a +2 bonus on Persuasion Checks. Applies Voice of the CircleRecharge: Once per Short RestRange: 1.5 m This action can be performed while equipping Envoy's Amulet. Weakening Strike Action Target an enemy's hands with a non-lethal attack to deal damage and possibly inflict Weak Grip.(Creatures without weapons can't have Weak Grip) STRRecharge: Once per Short Rest.Melee This action can be performed with the following weapons: Rapiers War Picks Most Warhammers
